name: Stunt Car Crash: Simulator
description:
SCC is a realistic car destruction simulator with a large fleet, tuning and derby with bots. Choose your car, tune it up and smash it in a large arena with jumps, grinders, presses and jackhammers. Slow down time, add bots, put on a show and have fun, the resource is endless.

Game Features:

- Realistic detailed vehicle damage technology
- Large fleet of cars, from USA to Japanese.
- Tuning, body and wheel painting, toning and more.
- Personal driver with various skins
- Free ride with open world and multiple parks
- Fun arcade modes with driver crash
- Cool graphics, soundtrack and detailed crash sounds

The game is being actively developed, if you find a bug please let us know by mail: support@peka.games or in a review.
